pullRequest.title: Create Azure SDK BOM
pullRequest.bodyText:
Creates a BOM file containing compatible Azure SDKs.
See the BOM guidelines for further explanation about the reasoning behind this change.

commit.message: Added azure-sdk-bom and dependency json to run dependency checker

nodes.bodyText: Should this be 1.0.0 instead? I don't think we are releasing beta versions for BOM.
Is this empty build section required?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,120 @@
+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">

+      </dependency>
+      <dependency>

+
+  <build>

nodes.bodyText: Should this file go under eng/pipelines/?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,43 @@
+# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE
+# This file is generated automatically and any changes will be lost.
+
+resources:

nodes.bodyText: Same here - should this be moved to eng/pipelines?

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,43 @@
+# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE
+# This file is generated automatically and any changes will be lost.
+
+resources:
+  repositories:
+    - repository: azure-sdk-build-tools
+      type: git
+      name: internal/azure-sdk-build-tools
+    - repository: azure-sdk-tools
+      type: github
+      name: Azure/azure-sdk-tools
+      endpoint: azure
+
+trigger:
+  branches:
+    include:
+      - master
+      - hotfix/*
+      - release/*
+  paths:
+    include:
+      - sdk/bom/
+
+pr:
+  branches:
+    include:
+      - master
+      - feature/*
+      - hotfix/*
+      - release/*
+  paths:
+    include:
+      - sdk/bom/
+
+stages:
+  - template: ../../eng/pipelines/templates/stages/archetype-sdk-client.yml
+    parameters:
+      ServiceDirectory: keyvault

commit.message: Added build plugin to run dependency checker

nodes.bodyText: This file is no longer necessary
You might want to include a comment here about the purpose of this plugin, how to use it, and what the outcomes / reports will be.

+          <analyseBom>true</analyseBom>
+          <failOnDependencyConflict>true</failOnDependencyConflict>
+        </configuration>
+      </plugin>

nodes.bodyText: Please do a little bit of research on the common naming patterns of these BOMs in other libraries - this was just the name I randomly selected when I mocked up this BOM.

Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            To consume the BOM add it as an artifact in the dependency management section of your project's POM.
          
          
            
            To consume the BOM include it in the `dependencyManagement` section of your project's POM. Note that this **does not** result in all dependencies being included in your project.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+# Azure BOM for client libraries
+The Azure BOM for client libraries provides a verified group of artifacts that are known to share a common dependency set. It provides a simple and elegant way to manage dependencies on multiple Azure client libraries.  
+
+## Table of contents
+- [Getting started](#getting-started)
+  - [Adding the BOM to your project](#adding-the-bom-to-your-project)
+  - [Adding libraries to your project](#adding-libraries-to-your-project)
+
+## Getting started
+
+### Adding the BOM to your project
+
+To consume the BOM add it as an artifact in the dependency management section of your project's POM.

nodes.bodyText: Can we please place this under: sdk/boms/azure-sdk-bom/pom.xml? I don't want to break the structure that has been established.
